title: Isengard Shaman (3C59)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	5
Vitality:	2
Site:	4
Game Text:	Response: If an [Isengard] Orc is about to take a wound, remove (2) to prevent that wound.
Lore:	”'Over all his works a dark smoke hung and wrapped itself about the sides of Orthanc.'”
Rarity:	C
